original_text: It is like a man going on a journey, when he leaves home and puts his servants in charge, each with his work, and commands the doorkeeper to stay awake.
korean_text: 가령 사람이 집을 떠나 타국으로 갈 때에 그 종들에게 권한을 주어 각각 사무를 맡기며 문지기에게 깨어 있으라 명함과 같으니

sentences.original_text: It is like a man going on a journey
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 여행을 떠나는 한 사람과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: and puts his servants in charge
and commands the doorkeeper to stay awake
